result.execSummary:
The defendant Kyle D. Gustum was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Request for Payment Plan, Agreement to Make Payments, and Order

Defendant Kyle D. Gustum in court with attorney Justin D. Wolff.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Agreement placed on the record.  Plea of no contest to Ct. 2.  Plea colloquy.  Court found the plea given freely, voluntarily, and intelligenlty; accepted plea; found DE guilty and ordered entry of JOC.  Pursuant to the agreement, Ct. 1 is dismissed and read in.  Court imposed $100 fine and court costs; and payment of $200 DNA surcharge.  Obligation added to current payment plan with payments increasing to $75/month commencing 01-15-2015.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 22, 2014 at 11:30 am.
Jury trial on December 15, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Kyle D. Gustum in court with attorney Justin D. Wolff.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of preliminary hearing filed.  Based on waiver, court bound DE over for trial.  Information filed by the state mirroring the criminal complaint.  Further reading of same waived, and entered a plea of not guilty to all the charges.  Matter shall be set for trial.  Jury trial scheduled for December 15, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Preliminary hearing on September 30, 2014 at 08:45 am.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.

Defendant Kyle D. Gustum in court with attorney Justin D Wolff.  Kristi S Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waived further reading of complaint; preliminary hearing requested with time limits waived freely and voluntarily.  PTC requested and scheduled.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 2, 2014 at 11:45 am.  - rt

*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.     Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Arrest Report

Kristi Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant appeared in court in custody. Court found probable cause for the arrest. Court advised DE of possible charges and penalties. Court advised DE of right to attorney.  Notice of right to attorney given to defendant.  State requested a $1000.00 signature bond with conditions of: comply with booking and no operation of motor vehicle without valid driver's license for the vehicle being operated.     Court ordered bond with conditions as requested.  Court also ordered Clerk of begin bond revocation procedures in 13CF102.  Initial appearance set for 06-17-2014 at 1:00 p.m.
